Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 43rd overall pick, by Boston (UBA) in 1981...
Injured on 7/27/1982 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Traded from Boston (UBA) to Toledo on 7/22/1984 (Going to PIL: P K. Arent. Going to TOL: P W. Enciso)...
Earned first career win on 5/20/1986...
Had first career hit on 8/17/1986, off Renato Luna (BC)...
